snippet.title: HUGE Details You Missed in Hytale’s New Gameplay Showcase
snippet.description:
Hytale is officially back, and the team just dropped a massive 16-minute gameplay reveal packed with new features, combat updates, world exploration, and long-awaited creative tools. In this video, Codiak breaks down everything you missed—from the new movement system and dynamic combat to UI upgrades, loot changes, world generation, and a first look at adventure mode’s enemies and environments. We also dive into creative mode tools, NPC spawning, world-gen features, and the biggest implications for Hytale’s early access launch.
